Text: NY TCCs Cc Guys Navigant is now following up with us regarding the TCC bids in the CH Resources auction We did make the nd round as you may recall for TCCs only but I need to know whether you guys are still interested given many changes since then Contract ID Start Date End Date Point of Injection ID Point of Injection Name West West Point of Injection Zone Zone A Zone A Point of Withdrawal ID Point of Withdrawal Name Hud VL Hud VL Point of Withdrawal Zone Zone G Zone G Summer MW Winter MW Please advise Thanks Pete Peter J Heintzelman Manager Northeast Power Origination Office Cell

RE headhuntersThanks Here are mine Have a nice evening Big deal at Tealas on Dallas PJH Original Message From Ward Kim S Houston Sent Thursday November PM To Heintzelman Pete Subject headhunters Army Guerrara called about a gas originator in N California Todd Kubicki Joelene Whittaker called about an originator position in Denver eprime or PSCO Patti Broderson Wyndham Mills called about several jobs one with FPL as a power originator in California Matt Shipman Jon Halliburton Looks like Im going to Denver to live with Paul Lucci he said I wouldnt have to pay rent Send me your list too K

Da plansOK just talked to LP We are going to meet up later with his Aunt Uncle very fun people and he and Cher around pm I have to go to a happy hour for Toshas departure at at Tealas You are welcome to come if you like Also we have been invited to go down to the bay near Galveston and ride Jetskis tomorrow afternoon with LP and Cher A guy from Halliburton has a big spread down there and it sounds like fun We are planning to go around lunch time That is good bc I need to get some stuff done tomorrow around the house Are you in I hope so PJH Peter J Heintzelman Manager Generation Investments Office Cell

Petes race on TV SundayTina will you copy our group please This weekend my friends and car nuts you can watch on TV my maiden voyage to the SCCA national championship race in which I ran in September at Mid Ohio It is on Speedvision which is in Houston channel if you have TW digital cable and if you have satellite svc Time is pm Sunday Dont expect to see me in the front but you may enjoy some close racing and see me somewhere on the screen My car looks like a Jamaican flag and I have a yellow helmet car Next year I will be looking to be at the front Thanks for everyones support and interest during this successful season Regards PJH Peter J Heintzelman Manager Northeast Power Origination Office Cell

Bifurcation structure Cc Thanks for discussing the FPL structure today After talking to several of you I think it is safe to say that the plant portion of the deal nonfirm would have to be physical However it does not have to be a separate entity eg plantco It is possible that FPL could do the trade in their nonfirm book while the contingent call option part could be done in their derivative book This would simplify settling since ENA would only invoice the FPL nonfirm book for mwh actually delivered However the contingent call would be financially settled easily If it is exercised FPL would pay us index less Since this is not to be modeled or marketed as a swap there is no fixed for float issue like that discussed this morning In other words Enron has no downside if the plant is down AND mkt prices are below except for the it paid in premium I talked to the client and they are noodling on some other structures so I will wait until I talk to them before I trouble you guys too much more about firming up this structure Thanks for your assistance so far Please let me know if you have any comments Regards Pete Peter J Heintzelman Manager Generation Investments Office Cell
